name: VoxApocalypse
description:
Story

In a postapocalyptic violent world a prisioner scape from his captors and he will try to get his revenge.
Punks, thiefs and all kind of wild people who live in this wastelands will meet his violence.
Based in Seville, south of Spain you will meet famous places of this city and another references

Controls
WASD - Movement

Left click - Meele attack

Right click - Shoot pistol

Space - Jump

V - Shotgun

Shift - Dash

L - Piss your enemies

Esc - Pause

J - quit censored in final boss


Key Features
- Violent wasteland world where you can kill your enemies in different ways

- 5 diferent enemies with his own mechanics

- 1 final boss, could you defeat him and doing him a Fatality execution?

- 3 weapons

- 2 secrets zones with curious details about the plot

Gameplay video


This was a prototype maked in two months, we are a team of two person only that want to developer a better version with a lot of new mechanics and expand this post apocalyptic universe, here a teaser video of we want to do:
